needs: Seeking contract leadership roles partnering with CMO/HR to deliver measurable quality improvements in chronic care, ED throughput and telemedicine. Aim to implement SLOs, runbooks, dashboards and lightweight care pathways within the first 90 days while managing governance and a $1.7M budget. Prefers rapid, instrumented probes to reduce readmissions and waste.
personality: Collaborative, facilitative leader who communicates with concise narrative docs, decision records and short demos. Makes evidence-based, pragmatic decisions by running small experiments and surfacing unknowns early. Values simplicity, clear accountability and humane processes, mentors through pairing, and drives cross-functional alignment with transparent SLOs, dashboards and measurable outcomes.
